attributes.action: Allow The Hull Fish Trades Boxing Club to stay open
attributes.additional_details: The Hull Fish Trades Boxing Team has been locked out of their premises at 42 Heron Street, Hull without be given written notice and has had all their equipment locked in by the Goodwin Development Trust and the council please sign this petition to show your support in keeping the club in these premises were it has been residence since the late 1950's serving the community's youth

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
